LandingSubtitle: Made from the ground up by Egyptian Devs
LandingP1: We aim to have our community and make it as we want, we want a community without shitposts, NSFW, stupid algorithms, reposting, Ai everywhere, Ai generated content, bots and spammers, we want it simple, lightweight and have old-school vibes! you can talk about any topic and be free, and you can be anonymous!
LandingP2: you can find many spaces that discuss all many topics, you can also start a new space by requesting us! we will review your request and make it for you, we aim to keep it free from repeatation.
LandingP3: you can report for any content that breaks our Rules or help us in moderation by joining us! the project is opensource for everyone and everywhere! you can contribute as a mod, dev or just donate to our project to keep it alive
usernameTips: Username must be between 3 and 50 characters, no special characters except _
passwordTips: Password should be between 8 and 50 characters and have Upper, smaller, number and special character (! @ # $).
emailComeSoonTips: Verification by Email and bassword reset coming soon.

min_username_3: Username must be at least 3 characters.
min_password_8: Password must be at least 8 characters.
